name: joey-schroeder-dot-com
description: Developer & Designer Joey Schroeder's online résumé

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m CLEAN \x1b[0m" Dist directory removed
scripts.copy-static-files: cp -r static/ dist/static/ && echo "\x1b[42m\x1b[1m COPY \x1b[0m" Copied static files to dist
scripts.eslint: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" No JavaScript ESLint errors to fix
scripts.eslint:fix: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" ESLint JavaScript errors fixed
scripts.pre-publish: npm run --silent stylelint && npm run --silent eslint && npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build && npm run --silent copy-static-files
scripts.stylelint: ./node_modules/.bin/stylelint 'src/**/*.scss' --config .stylelintrc && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m STYLELINT \x1b[0m" No StyleLint SCSS errors to fix
scripts.stylelint:fix: ./node_modules/.bin/stylelint --fix 'src/**/*.scss' --config .stylelintrc && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m STYLELINT \x1b[0m" StyleLint SCSS errors fixed
